data.comment: The match has started.
Mike Dean awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Man Utd to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Arsenal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Man Utd's half?
In the minute 5, Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
In the minute 8, Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Manchester Man Utd's Paul Pogba is caught offside.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
In the minute 12, Bukayo Saka (Arsenal) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 14, Man Utd have a goal kick.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Mason Greenwood for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 18, Mike Dean signals a free kick to Arsenal.
Mike Dean awards Man Utd a goal kick.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 22, Mason Greenwood gets his shot on target but fails to score for Man Utd.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 22, Man Utd's Fred has been booked in Manchester.
Free kick in a good position for Arsenal!
Free kick Man Utd.
Bruno Fernandes of Man Utd is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 25, Rob Holding (Arsenal) has received a yellow card from Mike Dean.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 27, Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gabriel Magalhaes (Arsenal) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Man Utd in the half of Arsenal.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Arsenal close to the penalty box.
Mike Dean signals a Arsenal throw-in in Man Utd's half.
Throw-in Man Utd.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Arsenal at Old Trafford.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Goal kick for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Great shot from Arsenal's Willian but he is denied by the crossbar.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 44, Arsenal attack but Bukayo Saka's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
The first half has been concluded at Old Trafford.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Old Trafford.
Bruno Fernandes (Man Utd) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
In the minute 46, Mike Dean blows against Man Utd's Paul Pogba for offside.
Aaron Wan-Bissaka (Man Utd) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
In the minute 48, Harry Maguire (Man Utd) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Arsenal at Old Trafford.
Mike Dean awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Arsenal.
Throw-in Man Utd.
In the minute 52, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang of Arsenal gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
Arsenal needs to be cautious. Man Utd have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Man Utd in the half of Arsenal.
Harry Maguire (Man Utd) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Mike Dean awards Arsenal a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Thomas Partey of Arsenal smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Man Utd make their first substitution with Nemanja Matic replacing Fred.
Free kick Arsenal.
In Manchester Arsenal attack through Mohamed Elneny. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 65, Man Utd have a goal kick.
An attacking Arsenal player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang.
In the minute 70, Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
At Old Trafford, Mason Greenwood has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Arsenal at Old Trafford.
Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Man Utd close to the penalty box.
Man Utd have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 75, The home team replace Mason Greenwood with Edinson Cavani.
Donny van de Beek is replacing Bruno Fernandes for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
In the minute 76, Man Utd's Harry Maguire breaks free at Old Trafford. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Mike Dean awards Arsenal a goal kick.
Mikel Arteta (Arsenal) is making a first substitution, with Edward Nketiah replacing Alexandre Lacazette.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Mike Dean signals a throw-in for Man Utd, close to Arsenal's area.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 79, Man Utd's Marcus Rashford gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
The match at Old Trafford has been interrupted briefly for a check on Rob Holding, who is down injured.
In the minute 80, Rob Holding has recovered and rejoins the match in Manchester.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Man Utd.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
In the minute 84, Mike Dean signals a Man Utd throw-in in Arsenal's half.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Donny van de Beek (Man Utd) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
In the minute 85, Throw-in high up the field for Man Utd in Manchester.
Throw-in high up the field for Man Utd in Manchester.
Ainsley Maitland-Niles is replacing Willian for the away team.
In the minute 87, Shkodran Mustafi is on a sub for Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang for Arsenal.
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang for Arsenal has been booked by Mike Dean and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Man Utd in the half of Arsenal.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mike Dean will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Man Utd's Nemanja Matic is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Arsenal.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
Man Utd's Harry Maguire has been booked in Manchester.
